* * *

WarehousePG can read and write XML data to and from external tables with gpfdist. For information about setting up an XML transform, see [Transforming External Data with gpfdist and gpload](../load/topics/transforming-xml-data.mdx).

**Parent topic:** [Examples for Creating External Tables](creating-external-tables---examples.mdx)
